name: Tap Bunny
description:
Game heavily inspired by One Tap Hero, you can download .apk file for your Android phone or just play the WebGL version here.

You're a bunny and your goal is to get that carrot waiting for you somewhere in each level. As it's common for bunnies - you jump, you jump alot. You jump to get in other parts of the level, you jump to avoid obstacles and dangers.

The game is designed for mobile, it's in very early state and will be changed a lot in the future. I'd love to hear all your feedback and opinions!
